credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Design for the South Wall of the Music Rooom
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
description:
Wall decoration consisting of three painted panels: a dragon horse in center panel, flanked by narrower panels containing figures of demon-chasers in motion. Bamboo ceiling above. The domed ceiling is indicated in outline, with fish-scale motif.

Original album associated with this collection still exists.  See 1948-40-1 accessory
name: Drawing
